title: Will Ahri get a Pool Party skin this year (2018) Or a different skin ?
body:
Do you guys think Ahri will get a pool party skin, ive heard rumors that they are working on a pool party Ahri skin but they dont like how it looks. 
Anyways what to you summoners think does she have to many skins now or should we give her a pool party skin and leave her alone for a few years?
